snippet: Bill de Blasio has a double-digit lead over his rivals in the Democratic primary, two polls find, but it remains to be seen whether he will avoid a runoff.
abstract: Trailside blog; two polls find that Bill de Blasio has a double-digit lead over his rivals in the New York City Democratic mayoral primary, but it remains to be seen whether he will avoid a runoff.
lead_paragraph: Bill de Blasio has a double-digit lead over his rivals in the Democratic primary, two polls find, but it remains to be seen whether he will avoid a runoff.

headline.main: De Blasio Holds Wide Lead in Mayor’s Race, Polls Show
